March 9, 1962
Mr. Derate Russell
Representative in the United States
British Broadcasting Corporation
630 Fifth Avenue
Mew York 20, Mew York
Dear Mr. Russell*
I am in receipt of your letter of March 6 to Mr. Harley and two (2)
tapes of BBC World Reports which X am returning to you after having
made copies for our possible use.
Having heard these tapes and having your letter of March 6 before me,
I am happy to confirm our intention of making this series available
to our affiliates. Unfortunately, our production schedule does not
allow, at this time, for distribution of this series free of charge
to those stations, commercial and noncommercial, which are not
affiliated with the Hkm Radio Network. X am confident of a large
response to this series from our network affiliates, end when a
regular mailing list for the series is ascertained X shall send a
copy to youj this list should be pretty well settled in less than a
month's time.
We are anxious to begin distribution of these programs as soon as
possible. Specifically, I should like to commence shipment from
herÂ® to our affiliates sometime during the week of March 18. We
shall attempt to mail each program to our affiliates the same day
the tape from London Is received, and in line with this I have some
questions.
1. On what day of each week is the program recorded in London? This
has some bearing because if we are able to obtain the program
early in the week, Monday preferably, then a majority of our
affiliates will be able to air the program sometime during the
same week. If, on the other hand, we receive the tape on
Thursday or Friday then broadcast must be delayed until the
following week. Of course, based on the content of the programs
X have heard, this may not be a factor, but if future programs
are quite timely then the time of receipt of the master tape
from London could be crucial.
2. Would it be possible for London to mail us a program In the near
future (a program which subsequently would be distributed) in
order that we might ascertain exactly how long shipment will take?
